document_name: Order No. 17782-2015 (Steering Committee of the Carbon Credit Marketing Fund for the Communities)
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/MDG/2015/MDG-2015-05-22-Order No. 17782-2015 (Steering Committee of the Carbon Credit Marketing Fund for the Communities)_8c8fa4793c83c32ca2eaa4390349cd9c.pdf
document_description: This decree establishes a Steering Committee of the Carbon Credit Sales Fund for Communities whose mission is to guide the use of this fund. The Steering Committee provides manages the Carbon Credit Sales Funds for the Communities and provides guidelines to these communities for its use.
